price: Gyesε wͻn yere nom (nko ara so), anaasε wͻn mfenaa a wͻyε wͻn dea. Saa nkorͻfoͻ no deε nokorԑ sԑ wͻ’nni soboͻ biara.
arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
